Interface SplitManager<T extends TimePeriod>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SequenceManager<T>

    public interface SplitManager<T extends TimePeriod>
    Interface for class that can split TimePeriods Normally this is implemented by the appropriate factory class
    Author:
    spb
